original_text:
Gods of Gold Infinireels
Gods of Gold Infinireels è l’ultima slot NetEnt che offre il sistema di pagamento a bobine infinite. Quello che inizia come un gioco a 27 linee di pagamento in un layout 3×3 può rapidamente espandersi a un numero enorme di modi per vincere e bobine, con ogni vittoria consecutiva. L’esposizione massima è di circa 5000x sulla scommessa vincente e per le caratteristiche, c’è un bonus di giri gratis e due modificatori di bobina con vittorie garantite.
Gods of Gold Infinireels è ancora una volta la prova che NetEnt può fare di più che creare una bella grafica per le loro slot, essendo un gioco in cui il gigante innova e introduce una nuova meccanica, che sembra promettente per il futuro. Si tratta di un tipo di gioco diverso rispetto a molti altri che provengono da questa azienda, che di solito è molto più focalizzata sul giocatore occasionale, mentre qui sembra che si rivolgano a giocatori che sono OK con alta volatilità.
Con questo gioco, si gioca inizialmente con 3 bobine e 3 righe di simboli, insieme a 27 modi per vincere, ma si ottiene anche la meccanica Infinireels, che permette un numero infinito di modi per vincere aggiungendo più bobine. Oltre a questo insolito meccanismo, la slot ha anche il simbolo wild, i respins casuali, il Multi Slam o i giri gratis che sono garantiti a pagamento. In definitiva, questo gioco ha una volatilità medio-alta, premi fino a 5.000x la posta in gioco, insieme al RTP del 96,12%.
Una grafica mitologica e preziosa
Pochi giri sul gioco e i giocatori che si distinguono possono riconoscere i colpi degli artisti di NetEnt che hanno iniziato questo con la testa fresca sulle spalle. Il risultato è un gioco che non manca di impressionare.
I simboli sono suddivisi nelle due categorie abituali. Quelli che pagano bene sono maschere e statue di divinità e l’altra categoria ha gemme in poche forme diverse.
Gli slot Gods of Gold Infinireels sono dinamici, e questo è il minimo. Il sistema di payout infinireels fa il suo dovere per elettrificare la danza sul reel-set e ci sono dei bit animati che sono una bella cosa.
Per avvolgere il tutto in una bella carta cerata, NetEnt ha ingaggiato un compositore di talento per trovare un leitmotiv musicale drammatico che segua l’avventura di questa bobina.
Il tema di Gods of Gold Infinireels sembra essere uno strano mix tra l’aspetto divino e la storia araba. Sembra includere il Genio, enormi cumuli di oro e pietre preziose, insieme a Wild e Scatter, un Re, una Regina, un Toro e un Gufo. I simboli minori sono caratterizzati da pietre preziose. Non è un granché come storia o tema, ma la qualità del design è piuttosto alta, proprio come si può trovare in molti altri titoli NetEnt.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il gioco ha il familiare layout NetEnt, che è una versione rimaneggiata delle loro impostazioni e della barra di controllo che hanno mantenuto per anni. Questo è migliorato e fa sì che la configurazione della scommessa comporti meno click e giri grazie alla rimozione dell’opzione dei livelli di scommessa.
Le scommesse nella slot Gods of Gold Infinireels iniziano con un ragionevole €0,20 per giro e terminano con un massimo di €100,00. Il massimo è ora il nuovo importo normale per una scommessa massima, che è una scommessa più sensata rispetto a quelle offerte nella maggior parte delle loro precedenti uscite.
Per selezionare la tua scommessa, basta scegliere il valore della moneta cliccando o toccando i pulsanti meno e più, e guardare l’importo nella finestra BET cambiare. Il pulsante Spin si trova in basso al centro, appena sotto la terza bobina. A destra c’è il simbolo dell’avanzamento veloce che fa sì che le bobine girino più velocemente quando vengono attivate.
Come abbiamo detto all’inizio, il reel-set inizia con tre bobine e le vittorie si fanno in 27 modi per vincere. Ad ogni risultato vincente vengono aggiunte altre bobine. Questi iniziano con tre simboli corrispondenti che devono verificarsi su bobine consecutive.
Se c’è un altro simbolo di corrispondenza aggiunto all’equazione che è risultato dall’arrivo della nuova bobina, la bobina impostata su Gods of Gold Infinireels slot si espanderà ancora una volta. I Wilds possono sostituire qualsiasi simbolo standard del gioco, il che significa che possono anche causare la comparsa di nuove bobine.
Questo è essenziale per un’inversione di tendenza del sistema di bobine a crollo/cascata, con l’unica differenza di aggiungere nuove bobine invece di sottrarre i simboli vincenti. In termini di payout, il simbolo più prezioso del gioco è il re col cappello rosso. Dieci dei suoi simboli pagano un incredibile 160x sulla scommessa vincente e cinque dello stesso pagano 5x.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Immagina quanto sia bello e misterioso camminare nella profonda giungla del regno azteco per scoprire i dischi d’oro che scatenano il tanto atteso bonus nella slot Aztec Gold Megaways. Il gioco porta un premio totale di 19.200x moltiplicato per la scommessa vincente, che può avvenire da un solo giro. Con un RTP del 95,99% e tre premi jackpot, questa è una slot da megaway che non deve essere trascurato.

raw_translation.response:
Gods of Gold Infinireels is NetEnt's latest slot game featuring the infinite reel payment system. What starts as a 27-payline game on a 3x3 layout can quickly expand into a huge number of ways to win and reels, with every consecutive win. The maximum exposure is about 5000x on the winning bet, and for features, there is a free spins bonus and two reel modifiers with guaranteed wins.

Gods of Gold Infinireels once again proves that NetEnt can do more than just create beautiful graphics for their slots. It's a game where the giant innovates and introduces a new mechanic that seems promising for the future. This is a different type of game compared to many others from this company, which usually focuses more on the casual player, while here it seems to target players who are okay with high volatility.

With this game, you initially play with 3 reels and 3 rows of symbols, along with 27 ways to win, but you also get the Infinireels mechanic, which allows for an infinite number of ways to win by adding more reels. In addition to this unusual mechanism, the slot also has the wild symbol, random respins, Multi Slam, or guaranteed payout free spins. Ultimately, this game has medium to high volatility, prizes up to 5,000x the stake, along with an RTP of 96.12%.

A Mythical and Precious Graphic

NetEnt's artists started this game with a fresh head on their shoulders, and the result is a game that doesn't fail to impress experienced gamblers. The symbols are divided into the usual two categories: those that pay well are masks and statues of deities, and the other category has gems in a few different shapes.

The Gods of Gold Infinireels slot machines are dynamic, and that's the minimum. The infinireels payout system does its job to electrify the dance on the reel-set, and there are some animated bits that are a nice touch. To wrap it all up nicely, NetEnt has hired a talented composer to find a dramatic leitmotif that follows the adventure of this reel.

The theme of Gods of Gold Infinireels seems to be a strange mix between the divine aspect and Arab history. It seems to include the Genie, huge piles of gold and precious stones, along with Wilds and Scatters, a King, a Queen, a Bull, and an Owl. The minor symbols are characterized by precious stones. It's not much of a story or theme, but the quality of the design is quite high, just like you can find in many other NetEnt titles.

Slot Machine Functions and Symbols

The game has the familiar NetEnt layout, which is a revamped version of their settings and control bar that they have kept for years. This is improved and makes the betting setup involve fewer clicks and spins, thanks to the removal of the bet level option.

Bets on the Gods of Gold Infinireels slot start at a reasonable €0.20 per spin and end at a maximum of €100.00. The maximum is now the new normal amount for a maximum bet, which is a more sensible bet than those offered in most of their previous releases.

To select your bet, simply choose the coin value by clicking or tapping the minus and plus buttons, and watch the amount in the BET window change. The Spin button is located at the bottom center, just below the third reel. To the right is the fast-forward symbol that makes the reels spin faster when activated.

As we said at the beginning, the reel-set starts with three reels, and wins are made in 27 ways to win. With every winning result, more reels are added. These start with three matching symbols that must appear on consecutive reels.

If another matching symbol is added to the equation that resulted from the arrival of the new reel, the reel set on the Gods of Gold Infinireels slot will expand once again. Wilds can replace any standard game symbol, which means they can also cause new reels to appear.

This is essential for a reversal of the cascade reel system, with the only difference being the addition of new reels instead of subtracting winning symbols. In terms of payouts, the most valuable symbol in the game is the king with the red hat. Ten of his symbols pay an incredible 160x on the winning bet, while five of the same pay 5x.

Other Similar Slot Machines

Imagine how beautiful and mysterious it is to walk through the deep jungle of the Aztec kingdom to discover the golden discs that trigger the highly anticipated bonus in the Aztec Gold Megaways slot. The game has a total prize of 19,200x multiplied by the winning bet, which can happen in a single spin. With an RTP of 95.99% and three jackpot prizes, this is a megaway slot that shouldn't be overlooked.

Gods of Gold Infinireels is the latest NetEnt slot game that offers infinite reel payout system. What initially starts as a game with 27 pay lines in a 3x3 layout can quickly expand to a huge number of ways to win and reels, with every consecutive win. The maximum exposure is around 5000x on the winning bet, and for features, there is a free spins bonus and two reel modifiers with guaranteed wins.

Gods of Gold Infinireels is once again proof that NetEnt can do more than just create beautiful graphics for their slots. It is a game where the giant innovates and introduces a new mechanic that seems promising for the future. It is a different type of game compared to many others that come from this company, which is usually more focused on the casual player, while this one seems to appeal to players who are okay with high volatility.

With this game, you initially play with 3 reels and 3 rows of symbols, together with 27 ways to win, but you also get the Infinireels mechanic, which allows for an infinite number of ways to win by adding more reels. In addition to this unusual mechanism, the slot also has the wild symbol, random respins, Multi Slam or free spins that are guaranteed to pay. Ultimately, this game has a medium-high volatility, prizes up to 5000x the stake, together with an RTP of 96.12%.

The graphics are mythical and precious. The symbols are divided into the two usual categories, with the ones that pay well being masks and statues of deities, while the other category has gems in various shapes. The slot Gods of Gold Infinireels is dynamic, and the payout system infinireels does its job to electrify the dance on the reel-set, with animated bits that are a beautiful thing.

To wrap it all up, NetEnt has engaged a talented composer to find a dramatic leitmotif that follows the adventure of this reel. The theme of Gods of Gold Infinireels seems to be a strange mix of divine appearance and Arabian history. It includes the Genie, huge stacks of gold and precious stones, along with Wild and Scatter, a King, a Queen, a Bull, and an Owl. The minor symbols are characterized by precious stones. It may not be a great story or theme, but the quality of the design is pretty high, just like in many other NetEnt titles.

Functions and symbols of the Slot Machine

The game has the familiar NetEnt layout, which is a reworked version of their settings and control bar that they have maintained for years. This is improved and makes the betting setup require fewer clicks and spins thanks to the removal of the option of betting levels.

Bets in the slot Gods of Gold Infinireels start with a reasonable €0.20 per spin and end with a maximum of €100.00. The maximum is now the new normal amount for a maximum bet, which is a more sensible bet compared to those offered in most of their previous releases.

To select your bet, simply choose the coin value by clicking or tapping the less and more buttons and watch the amount in the BET window change. The Spin button is located at the bottom center, just below the third reel. On the right, there is the fast forward symbol that makes the reels spin faster when activated.

As we said at the beginning, the reel-set starts with three reels, and wins are made in 27 ways to win. With every winning result, more reels are added. These start with three matching symbols that must occur on consecutive reels.

If another matching symbol is added to the equation resulting from the arrival of the new reel, the reel set on the Gods of Gold Infinireels slot will expand once again. Wilds can substitute any standard game symbol, which means they can also cause new reels to appear.

This is essential for a reversal of the cascading reel system, with the only difference being the addition of new reels instead of subtracting winning symbols. In terms of payout, the most valuable symbol in the game is the King with the red hat. Ten of his symbols pay an incredible 160x on the winning bet, and five of the same pay 5x.

The game offers a total prize of 19,200x multiplied by the winning bet, which can occur from a single spin. With an RTP of 95.99% and three jackpot prizes, this is a megaway slot that should not be overlooked.

Review: Gods of Gold Infinireels is NetEnt's latest slot game featuring the infinite reel payment system. What starts as a 27-payline game on a 3x3 layout can quickly expand into a huge number of ways to win and reels, with every consecutive win. The maximum exposure is about 5000x on the winning bet, and for features, there is a free spins bonus and two reel modifiers with guaranteed wins.

Gods of Gold Infinireels once again proves that NetEnt can do more than just create beautiful graphics for their slots. It's a game where the giant innovates and introduces a new mechanic that seems promising for the future. This is a different type of game compared to many others from this company, which usually focuses more on the casual player, while here it seems to target players who are okay with high volatility.

With this game, you initially play with 3 reels and 3 rows of symbols, along with 27 ways to win, but you also get the Infinireels mechanic, which allows for an infinite number of ways to win by adding more reels. In addition to this unusual mechanism, the slot also has the wild symbol, random respins, Multi Slam, or guaranteed payout free spins. Ultimately, this game has medium to high volatility, prizes up to 5,000x the stake, along with an RTP of 96.12%.

The Gods of Gold Infinireels slot machines are dynamic, and that's the minimum. The infinireels payout system does its job to electrify the dance on the reel-set, and there are some animated bits that are a nice touch. To wrap it all up nicely, NetEnt has hired a talented composer to find a dramatic leitmotif that follows the adventure of this reel.

The theme of Gods of Gold Infinireels seems to be a strange mix between the divine aspect and Arab history. It seems to include the Genie, huge piles of gold and precious stones, along with Wilds and Scatters, a King, a Queen, a Bull, and an Owl. The minor symbols are characterized by precious stones. It's not much of a story or theme, but the quality of the design is quite high, just like you can find in many other NetEnt titles.

Slot Machine Functions and Symbols

The game has the familiar NetEnt layout, which is a revamped version of their settings and control bar that they have kept for years. This is improved and makes the betting setup involve fewer clicks and spins, thanks to the removal of the bet level option.

Bets on the Gods of Gold Infinireels slot start at a reasonable €0.20 per spin and end at a maximum of €100.00. The maximum is now the new normal amount for a maximum bet, which is a more sensible bet than those offered in most of their previous releases.

The Spin button is located at the bottom center, just below the third reel. To the right is the fast-forward symbol that makes the reels spin faster when activated.

As we said at the beginning, the reel-set starts with three reels, and wins are made in 27 ways to win. With every winning result, more reels are added. These start with three matching symbols that must appear on consecutive reels.

If another matching symbol is added to the equation that resulted from the arrival of the new reel, the reel set on the Gods of Gold Infinireels slot will expand once again. Wilds can replace any standard game symbol, which means they can also cause new reels to appear.

This is essential for a reversal of the cascade reel system, with the only difference being the addition of new reels instead of subtracting winning symbols. In terms of payouts, the most valuable symbol in the game is the king with the red hat. Ten of his symbols pay an incredible 160x on the winning bet, while five of the same pay 5x.
